statements: UPDATE user_preferences SET payment_option='Credit Card', biometric_data='Fingerprint Scan' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE user_preferences SET recommendations='None', biometric_data='Face Recognition', payment_option='PayPal' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE user_preferences SET payment_option='Credit Card', biometric_data='Fingerprints' WHERE id=1
UPDATE user_preferences SET recommendations='Automated recommendations', payment_option='PayPal' WHERE id=2

UPDATE UserPreferences SET payment_options = '{"credit_card": 1234567890, "paypal": "example@paypal.com"}', recommendations = '{"show_recommendations": true, "recommendation_list": ["item1", "item2"]}' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE BiometricData SET facial_recognition_data = '{"eyes": "blue", "nose": "thin"}', heart_rate_data = '{"resting_rate": 60, "peak_rate": 180}' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET biometric_data = '{"weight": 70, "height": 175}' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE BiometricData SET facial_recognition_data = '{"feature1": 0.75, "feature2": 0.85}' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_preferences SET biometric_data = '{"height": 175, "weight": 70, "age": 30, "blood_type": "A+"}', recommendations = 'Stay active and hydrated' WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE payment_options SET credit_card_number = '1234-5678-9101-1121', billing_address = '123 Main St, City, Country' WHERE user_id = 5
UPDATE user_preferences SET payment_options = '{"type": "credit card", "expires": "12/25"}' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE biometric_data SET height = 70.5, weight = 165.3, age = 35 WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET biometric_data = '{"method":"fingerprint"}', payment_options = '{"method":"credit_card"}' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE BiometricData SET facial_recognition_data = '{"algorithm":"xyz"}', voice_recognition_data = '{"enabled":true}' WHERE user_id = 456;

UPDATE UserPreferences SET payment_options = '{"method": "credit", "card": "1234-5678-9012", "address": {"street": "123 Main St", "city": "New York", "zipcode": "10001"}}', recommendations = '{"type": "clothing", "items": ["shirt", "pants", "shoes"]}' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE PaymentOptions SET payment_method = 'paypal', billing_address = '{"street": "456 Elm St", "city": "Los Angeles", "zipcode": "90001"}' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_preferences SET biometric_data = '{"heart_rate": 70, "temperature": 98.6, "blood_pressure": {"systolic": 120, "diastolic": 80}}' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE biometric_data SET temperature = 99.2 WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE user_preferences SET biometric_data = '{"heart_rate": 75, "temperature": 98.6, "blood_pressure": {"systolic": 120, "diastolic": 80}}' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE biometric_data SET heart_rate = 80, temperature = 99.2, blood_pressure = '{"systolic": 118, "diastolic": 78}' WHERE user_id = 201;
